Just help the guy instead of flaming
If i could i would but i cant.
[/quote]io9` can’t help that. Reminds me of a fat version of a Guido.

I’m not sure that Frell can be helped though.

Im going to look into finding more helpful resources, Its searching through java tutorials for the tutorial or ‘guide’ on using thread and other methods. Its hard for me to find them.[/quote]

The search on Suns site is the crappiest search engine created since the one on Veoh.
Use Google for all your searching needs.
Or just click here.

item.title: Sleeping twice
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:12, topic:140063”][quote author=sparkz link=topic=192209.msg1732112#msg1732112 date=1188935616]

Your in the gui thread doing a sleep?

Run this is a seperate thread?

so when one thread is finished a new one will start?

The whole point of multithreading is that you can do multiple things (in theory) at once…

http://www.devarticles.com/c/a/Java/Multithreading-in-Java/
[/quote]
Don’t encourage the idiots. Let them use google on their own.

ALSO, READ THE FUCKING SUN TUTORIALS:
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/concurrency/ http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/concurrency/ http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/concurrency/ EDIT: Im not good on finding the tutorial that tells me what i need.

And since you guys are such asses and cant just point me to the tutorials then lock, I dont need anymore help. I did it in faggot VB.
